author: Janetta Schuch
comment: I like to see where those swarms of over 6 quakes are going on.
title: Like it

author: Nate Estep
comment: Displays quakes in near real time with a minimum of fuss and no ads.
title: Responsive

author: Eric Jefferson
comment: Will not localize to continental United States

reply.author: ISTI
reply.content: Can you provide some details on the problem you are seeing. The app is supposed to use UTC for the time of the event, but in the detailed event view it displays the time displayed in local time. If there is a bug we will try to address it.

title: Pass

author: john moore
comment: I had high hopes for this app, if it did what it was supposed to do it would be great but all i have is a world map showing nothing at all. Please fix this app

reply.author: ISTI
reply.content: The earthquake feed was down for a while, but there is now a new server running. This should now work.

author: Jim Kelly
comment: Would be great but does not download any data, useless.

reply.author: ISTI
reply.content: The earthquake feed was down for a while, but there is now a new server running. This should now work.

title: Doesn't work

reply.author: ISTI
reply.content: The earthquake feed was down for a while, but there is now a new server running. This should now work.

author: Christa H
comment: It's great that it includes tsunami warnings, however it is unhelpful if a warning is given when the report says there is No warning. Too much work.

reply.author: ISTI
reply.content: The tsunami warning texts are human generated, and we try to parse them automatically. We are currently working with NOAA on the next generation Tsunami Warning System, and when we complete that project the tsunami text messages will be more standardized and this app will parse them all correctly. Delivery of that system will happen in 2015.

title: Pros and cons

author: Deidra Sawyer
comment: I think this app has a lot of potential. What I would like to see is a way to set the time zone and a way to set a specific map zone. Also the set map soon function doesn't respond. The set magnitude colors needs to have a better description on the functions. I can't wait to see what's done w this app.

author: A Google User
comment: Just the right amount of info I've been looking for. Excellent set-up. Well done!
title: Absolutely perfect!
